title: Very difficult 1910 t213-1 Cranston available - price lowered!
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Very difficult 1910 t213-1 Cranston available - price lowered!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen
Tough card from a deceptively tough set.  This Cranston has one mild corner wrinkle but is otherwise in solid GD/VG condition with no significant wear or creasing.  The back is perfectly clean and damage free.

Looking to trade the card for Zeenuts from 1911-1920 however I'd sell the card for $185 if anyone had an interest in buying the card directly.

Thanks in advance,
Brian
redmaccie@hotmail.com
